section.name: Release Description
section.p: The Release Description Documents (RDDs) detail the new and modified capabilities that comprise a particular Archive Program Set release. These documents will also describe any impact that the new or modified capabilities will have on HORIZON operations, data providers and data consumers. The intended audience for these documents includes the HORIZON Test Engineer and Configuration Manager.

ul.li:
Version 5.0.0d
Date: 2014-04-11
Description: This release of Archive Program Set is a component of the integrated release (5.0.0d) of the HORIZON System. This release is intended as an operational release.

Version 5.0.0c
Date: 2013-12-08
Description: This release of Archive Program Set is a component of the integrated release (5.0.0c) of the HORIZON System. This release is intended as an operational release.
